::: {.cell}

:::


### Github Repositories


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|repo                        |description                                                                                        |
|:---------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|[MarineSensitivity.github.io](https://github.com/MarineSensitivity/MarineSensitivity.github.io)|default website                                                                                    |
|[api](https://github.com/MarineSensitivity/api)|application programming interface (API) using R Plumber package                                    |
|[apps](https://github.com/MarineSensitivity/apps)|Shiny applications                                                                                 |
|[docs](https://github.com/MarineSensitivity/docs)|documentation for BOEM's offshore environmental sensitivity index products                         |
|[manuscripts](https://github.com/MarineSensitivity/manuscripts)|Manuscripts with review of sensitivities by industry and receptors (species, habitats, human uses) |
|[msens](https://github.com/MarineSensitivity/msens)|R library of functions for mapping marine sensitivities, sponsored by BOEM                         |
|[objectives](https://github.com/MarineSensitivity/objectives)|repository for issues spanning multiple repositories and doing big picture roadmapping             |
|[server](https://github.com/MarineSensitivity/server)|server setup for R Shiny apps, RStudio IDE, R Plumber API, PostGIS database, pg_tileserv           |
|[workflows](https://github.com/MarineSensitivity/workflows)|scripts for testing data analytics and visualization as well as production workflows               |


:::
:::
